intro.text: You are a mother in Haifa, 1947. Rumors of war are spreading.
intro.fact: In April 1948, over 50,000 Palestinians were expelled from Haifa.

escape.text: You flee to Nazareth with your children.
escape.fact: Over 750,000 Palestinians became refugees during the Nakba.

wait.text: The bombing worsens. You are forced to flee without him.
wait.fact: Families were often separated during the chaos of displacement.
